data.title: Debit Card Offers - Personal Banking
data.text:
Debit Card Offers

Enable your Debit Card for Online/PoS/Contactless Transactions using YONO / YONOLITE/ Internet Banking / ATM, Call to 18001234/18002100 or by visiting a branch.

10% off upto ₹100 on orders above ₹499 using SBI Debit Card.

Coupon Code: SBIDC100

Offer Period - Aug 20th to Aug 27th 2024.

Offer Construct:

Applicable using SBI Debit Cards on Swiggy Instamart platform

Once per user during the campaign

Offer duration subject to change

Other T&Cs may apply

Steps to Redeem:

· Log in to the Swiggy app or www.swiggy.in & go to the Instamart section

· Add items to the cart & click on make payment.

· Pay using SBI

· Debit Card to get the discount.

*Merchant T&C Apply

Get ₹ 200* cashback on your first Tap & Pay transactions.

Offer Valid till 31st Dec,2024

Offer Construct:

On your first successful mobile tap transaction made on a POS/ Card reader machine via your SBI Debit card added on Google pay, you get a guaranteed and instant cashback of INR 200 from Google Pay.

*T&C Apply

Tap, Pay and Earn 2X Rewards.

Offer Period - 12th August (00:00 Hours) to 11th September (23:59 Hours)

Offer Construct:

Customer who does a tap and pay transaction through Google Pay or Samsung Wallet using SBI debit card during the campaign period will earn 2X reward points

*T&C Apply

Flat ₹75 off on orders above ₹499 using SBI Debit Card.

Coupon Code: SBIDC75

Offer Period - Wednesdays to Sundays only Valid until September 30th 2024.

Offer Construct:

·Applicable once per user per month, Wednesdays to Sundays only

·Valid only on SBI Debit Cards only

·Offer duration subject to change

·Other T&Cs may apply

Steps to Redeem:

·Log in to the Swiggy app or www.swiggy.in & go to the Food section

·Add items to the cart & click on make payment.

·Pay using SBI

·Debit Card to get the discount.

*Merchant T&C Apply

Travel With SBI Rewardz 2.O

Offer Period - 1st August ,2024 to 31st August , 2024

Offer Construct:

Minimum transaction to qualify to avail the campaign offer will be above Rs. 5,000/- in SBI Debit Card Spends through SBI Rewardz Portal.

5x accelerated points Maximum upto 1000 points can be awarded to the customers.

*T&C Apply

Apply for a Debit Card and Earn ₹ 500 Reward Points on your first purchase.

Offer Period - 18th July,2024 to 31st Aug , 2024

Offer Construct:

The offer would be valid for only those customers who have received the offer on their mobile number or email registered with the bank.

The Bonus Reward Points offered during the Campaign will be 500 for customers to whom Debit Card is issued during campaign period, provided they make at least one transaction using new Debit Card at point-of-sale terminals (POS) or online (e-commerce) for a minimum transaction of ₹ 500 by 30th Sep 2024.

* T&C Apply

Free Zepto Pass subscription with your SBI Debit Card.

Coupon Code: SBIDCZEPTO

Offer Construct:

Free access to 2 months of Zepto Pass

Unlimited free deliveries

Up to 20% extra off on orders

Get essentials like groceries, fruits & vegetables and more delivered in minutes

*Merchant T&C Apply

Unlock the ultimate fitness deal with your SBI Debit Card on FITPASS Memberships!

Offer Valid until 31st May 2025

*Merchant T&C Apply

Mastercard offers

Mastercard Independence day offers

Anytime Fitness

Up to 15% off

10% off on Half Early Membership on Club Rack Rates and 15% off on Yearly Membership on Club Rack Rates

Simple ask for this offer before the bill is generated and pay with your Mastercard debit card.

Offer valid till 30th September 2024

Behrouz Biryani

Rs. 120 off on Minimum Purchase Value of Rs. 249

Get Rs. 120 off on Minimum Purchase Value of Rs. 249

Use promocode PNBBB120 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card.

Offer valid till 31st December 2024

Eat Better

Get 25% off Total Bill

Use promocode MASTER25 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card

Offer valid till 31st March 2025

Lifestyle

Get 10% discount on minimum purchase of INR 1999 at Lifestyle on online Shopping for Men, Women and Kids in India.

Use Promocode MS10 at checkout and pay using Mastercard Card.

Offer valid till 30th Sept 2024

R for Rabbit

10% off on Sitewide

Get 10% off on Sitewide

Use promocode RFRTHR10 at checkout and payment by Mastercard card

Offer valid till 31st March 2025

*Merchant T&C Apply

Business Debit Card Offers

Google Workspace - Save 25% on Business Standard plans

MediBuddy - ₹ 1/- That’s all you pay for your First Doctor Consultation!

Awfis - Get 15% discount at Awfis

FabHotels - Get flat 32% off on Bookings at FabHotels

DHL - Get 50% off on all International Shipments at DHL

Cleartax - Get up to 60% off on Business Incorporation and Compliance Service

*T&C Apply

COUPON CODE: RUPAY1800

COUPON CODE: IGPRUPAY20

COUPON CODE : LIFEIN15

boAt

COUPON CODE: BOATXRUPAY

₹300 off on Silver Jewelry on Minimum Order Value of ₹999.

COUPON CODE : THR-RUPAY300

Zouk

Flat ₹500/- off on zouk bags, wallets and footwear range

COUPON CODE : ZBBIG500

Sweet Truth

Get 35% off upto ₹110 orders of ₹249 & above

COUPON CODE : RU08ST

*Merchant T&C Apply
